channel.title: Ryan Tablada - iOffertory
channel.description:
Hey all,
I am a bootstrapper starting [iOffertory](https://ioffertory.com), a way for non-profits to increase donor participation through easy-to-use campaign software. I am currently in the process of building my initial client base as the initial application is completed.
I also am very active in OpenSource PHP development (especially surrounding Laravel).
I have been listening to bootstrapped since E1.

item.title: Ryan Tablada - iOffertory
